nodes.text: Bright Suns Youngling Breakfast was a breakfast dish for younglings which was served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Batuu's Black Spire Outpost. It included eggs, potatoes, and fruit. A larger meal called Bright Suns Morning was also available.

This dish is found in the real world Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description reads, "Scrambled eggs, purple potatoes, and seasonal fresh fruit served with a choice of small lowfat milk or small DASANI® water."
